live_updates: Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
49258.summary: Some customers in the Munroe East area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49258.title: May 7 - Winnipeg (Munroe East) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
